T02D2958:40b-0: @40b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2958:40b-1: 'phags pa rnam par 'joms pa'i sgo nas rab tu
T02D2958:40b-2: gnas par byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam
T02D2958:40b-4: / gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2958:40b-5: cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhengs
T02D2958:40b-6: te / mchod pa'i yo byad ji ltar 'byor pa bshams te /
T02D2958:40b-7: mgon po dang 'byung po rnams la gtor ma'i bye brag rab tu bzang po yang bsham /
T02D2958:40b-8: chos skyong la gtor ma chen po bshams la bdag nyid kyis bsnyen pa ci rigs par bya /
T02D2958:40b-9: de nas rab tu gnas par byed pa'i rten sku'i rten ras ris su bris pa dang /
T02D2958:40b-12: gsung pu sti la sogs pa thugs rdo rje dang
T02D2958:40b-13: dril bu la sogs pa gang yin pa de khrus
T02D2958:40b-14: nas bton la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su shing
T02D2958:40b-15: leb la sogs pa'i steng du khri'i steng du ras
T02D2958:40b-16: ser po dri ma med pas dril la gzhag go
T02D2958:40b-17: // de nas yon bdag gsum la skyabs su 'gro
T02D2958:40b-18: ba la sogs pa sdig pa bshags pa dang sems
T02D2958:40b-19: // bskyed par bya'o // de nas bdag nyid kyang khrus bya ste /
T02D2958:40b-20: gos gsar pa gyon la bum pa re re la
T02D2958:40b-21: snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos pa brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2958:40b-22: bzlas la / sku rten khro bo yin na rigs nges pa'i sa bon snying gar bcug ste /
T02D2958:40b-23: gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ba dang /
T02D2958:40b-24: shangs dang zhal bkru ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2958:40b-25: khro bo'i dur khrod kyi rgyan brgyang gdags /
T02D2958:40b-26: so so'i rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan la /
T02D2958:40b-27: snying ga'i sa bon la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par byas la /
T02D2958:40b-28: rab tu brtan par bzhugs su gsol /
T02D2958:40b-29: lha so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la yon bdag dang gnyis su med par bstim /
T02D2958:41a-1: skyong la gtad de mnga' gsol /
T02D2958:41a-2: zhi ba'i sku nyan thos kyi cha lugs yin na /
T02D2958:41a-3: yang so so'i sa bon gzhug pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2958:41a-4: de nas zhal bsil ba dang /
T02D2958:41a-5: dbu skra bzhar ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2958:41a-6: chos gos dang rgyan rnams gdags /
T02D2958:41a-7: de nas ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste /
T02D2958:41a-8: de'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la brtan par bya /
T02D2958:41a-9: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul la yon bdag dang gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02D2958:41a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs yin na /
T02D2958:41a-11: yang gong ltar byas la byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan do shal la sogs pas rgyan gdags /
T02D2958:41a-12: de nas yon bdag gi don du bstim pa la sogs pa bya /
T02D2958:41a-16: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug la bum pa'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2958:41a-17: gsung gi rten rnams la spyan dbye ba dang /
T02D2958:41a-18: zhal bkru ba la sogs pa byas /
T02D2958:41a-19: ljags spel ba la sogs pa byas la dam chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab /
T02D2958:41a-20: hr'i: las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2958:41a-21: de nas me long gi nang du bum pa'i chus bkru /
T02D2958:41a-23: rab tu dgyes shing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2958:41a-25: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2958:41a-26: thugs kyi rten la byed na 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur /
T02D2958:41a-27: khrus nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ye shes sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D2958:41a-28: gnyis su med par bstim par bya /
T02D2958:41a-31: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D2958:41a-32: so so'i snying po gsal ba med na rdo rje
T02D2958:41a-33: rnam 'joms kyi sku dpag tu med pa sprul te
T02D2958:41a-34: / de nyid kyi snying po shin tu bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2958:41a-35: de nyid dang gnyis su med par byas la rang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2958:41a-36: de la ma mos na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin na aom //
T02D2958:41a-37: rdo rje'i rigs yin na h'um /
T02D2958:41a-38: rin po che'i rigs la sv'a /
T02D2958:41a-40: las kyi rigs la h'a ci rigs par ba zlas so //
T02D2958:41a-41: gsung gi rten rnams la gcig gis rgyud stong phrag
T02D2958:41a-42: gcig klag / de nyid brgya brgya'i bar du mchod
T02D2958:41b-1: grub na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ci rigs par 'grub par bya /
T02D2958:41b-2: phyogs skyong ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa la gtor ma gus par btang /
T02D2958:41b-3: bdag nyid bzlas pa la zhugs pa'i dus su khrus dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya zhing /
T02D2958:41b-4: sha dang nya dang sgog pa la sogs pa /
T02D2958:41b-5: btsong dang chang dang bud med dang /
T02D2958:41b-6: phyi dro'i kha zas bdun spangs la zas dkar chos la brten zhing zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun nam /
T02D2958:41b-7: smyung bar gnas par bya ba ni bzlas pa bum pa gtso bo'i dus na nges par yin no //
T02D2958:41b-8: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi rten la dbang bskur
T02D2958:41b-9: rdzogs nas mchod pa'i las ji ltar 'grub par byas
T02D2958:41b-10: la / dben pa'i sar bzhugs su gsol /
T02D2958:41b-11: de nas yon bdag gi don du sbyin sreg ji
T02D2958:41b-12: ltar rigs par byas la dbang ci rigs par bskur
T02D2958:41b-13: ro // de nas dbang rdzogs nas yon bdag gis
T02D2958:41b-14: mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa yi dam de dag
T02D2958:41b-15: ro // la mchod / chos skyong la gtor ma chen po cig btang la /
T02D2958:41b-16: bdag gi yi dam gyi lha 'di rab tu bkra shis pa dang byin rlabs che ba dang /
T02D2958:41b-17: bstan pa ji srid du gnas pa'i bar la bsrung ba dang /
T02D2958:41b-18: mchod pa mdzad du gsol zhes gtor ma btang /
T02D2958:41b-19: de nas phyogs skyong la sogs pa'i gtor ma rab tu rgya che bar btang ngo //
T02D2958:41b-20: dung dang rnga dang cha lang dang dril bu la
T02D2958:41b-21: sogs pa'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang bsgrag
T02D2958:41b-22: go // de nas bkra shis gsol te yon bdag kyang khrus nas gdon /
T02D2958:41b-24: brab pa dang byab pa la sogs pa bya /
T02D2958:41b-25: tshe 'phel ba'i don du 'dur ba sbyin par bya /
T02D2958:41b-26: de ltar cho ga'i gzhung ma nor bar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bsdu /
T02D2958:41b-28: bla ma la yon rab tu gus pa dang ldan pas dbul lo //
T02D2958:41b-29: de nas yon bdag gi longs spyod dang tshe 'phel ba dang /
T02D2958:41b-30: tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i don du ston mo ji ltar 'byor pa bya'o ;
T02D2958:41b-31: / chos dang zang zing gi 'byor pa yang ci 'byor pas gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2958:41b-32: mdor na cho ga gtso bos sems bskyed sngon du byas pa las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
T02D2958:41b-33: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rab tu
T02D2958:41b-34: gnas pa'i cho ga / slob dpon chen po dpal
